name: Curling Super Championship
synopsis: Curling is the world famous sport in which players slide stones across a sheet of ice toward a target area, the "house". Two teams, each of four players, take turns sliding heavy stones, also called "rocks". You can challenge your friends to a multiplayer game to show everyone who the best player is! Key Features: - Realistic curling game - Real-time physics - Colourful 3D graphics - Play against the computer AI or player vs player - Multiplayer (Hotseat, or with several copies of the game) - Unlockable achievements
